      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_1836b546364a2e5fe5d9707d26773486a047fe45</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic flux of a permanent bar magnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetischer Fluß eines permanenten 
Stabmagneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flux magnétique d'une barre aimantée 
permanente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo magnético de um ímã de barra permanente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento continuo magnetico di un magnete di 
barra permanente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητική ροή ενός μόνιμου μαγνήτη ράβδων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flux magnético de un imán de barra permanente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that the magnetic flux lines generated by a permanent bar magnet are always directed from the North pole going to the South pole of the magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">permanent bar magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die magnetischen 
Flußzeilen, die durch einen permanenten Stabmagneten festgelegt 
werden, immer vom Nordpol verwiesen werden, der auf den Südpol des 
Magneten geht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que les lignes 
magnétiques de flux produites par une barre aimantée permanente sont
toujours dirigées du poteau du nord allant vers le pôle 
Du sud de l'aimant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que as linhas 
magnéticas do fluxo geradas por um ímã de barra permanente estão 
dirigidas sempre do pólo norte que vai ao pólo sul do ímã.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che le righe 
magnetiche di cambiamento continuo generate da un magnete di barra 
permanente sono dirette sempre dal polo del nord che va verso il polo 
del sud del magnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι οι γραμμές 
μαγνητικής ροής που παράγονται από έναν μόνιμο μαγνήτη ράβδων 
κατευθύνονται πάντα από το βόρειο πόλο που πηγαίνει στο νότιο 
πόλο του μαγνήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que las líneas 
magnéticas del flux generadas por un imán de barra permanente están
dirigidas siempre del Polo Norte que va al poste del sur del imán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetpole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">permanente Stabmagneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südpol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôles magnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôle du nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">barres aimantées permanentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poteau du sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólos magnéticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólo norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímãs de barra permanentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pólo sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poli magnetici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magneti di barra permanente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">palo del sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
